channel.title: vagrant on Suraj Deshmukh
channel.description: Recent content in vagrant on Suraj Deshmukh

item.title: Sharing Vagrant Box offline
item.description: If you have some box that was downloaded on your machine from Atlas but now you wanna share it on other machines and you don’t have internet to download it, how do you share it? You will need to export the box from machine that has it downloaded already. So on machine with boxes: $ vagrant box list centos/7 (libvirt, 1610.01) centos/7 (libvirt, 1704.01) fedora/25-cloud-base (libvirt, 20161122) fedora/26-cloud-base (libvirt, 20170705) I wanted to share fedora/26-cloud-base box to another machine.
